description:
cmd/go: honour buildflags in go run

Either documentation or implementation
of go run's flags is wrong currently.
This change assumes the documentation
to be right.

messages.text:
I think I just forgot to edit run.go.
Can you make it call addBuildFlags instead of having a separate list?

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, rsc@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

*** Submitted as f6523e003ea9 ***

cmd/go: honour buildflags in go run

Either documentation or implementation
of go run's flags is wrong currently.
This change assumes the documentation
to be right.

R=golang-dev, rsc
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5752054

Committer: Russ Cox <rsc@golang.org>

subject: code review 5752054: cmd/go: honour buildflags in go run
